/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades a testament to the city's architectural diversity. A white van is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, its rays filtering through the leaves of the trees, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
